Ingredients.2: 5 (0.73 ounce) envelopes Swiss Miss Milk Chocolate Hot Cocoa Mix, divided

Ingredients.6: 2 (16 ounce) cans refrigerated jumbo buttermilk biscuits (8 count), quartered

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Spray 10-cup Bundt or fluted tube pan with baking spray; set aside. Combine 2 envelopes hot cocoa mix and 1/4 cup sugar in large resealable food storage bag. Prepare glaze by combining remaining hot cocoa mix and sugar in small bowl; whisk in Parkay and milk until blended.

Directions.2: Place half of biscuit pieces in cocoa mixture in bag; seal and shake to coat. Arrange coated biscuit pieces in bottom of pan; pour half of glaze over biscuits. Repeat with remaining biscuit pieces and glaze.

Directions.3: Bake 30 minutes or until brown. Cool in pan 5 minutes. Invert onto serving tray. Pull apart and serve with Reddi-wip.
